import'Components/System/Popup/popup.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PopupText=_ref=>{let{isCorrect,answerKey,explanation,characterItem}=_ref;if(!characterItem){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});// データがまだ読み込まれていない場合のローディング表示
}const iconClass=isCorrect?'oxIcon correct':'oxIcon inCorrect';let correctAnswer;if(Array.isArray(answerKey)){correctAnswer=answerKey.map(key=>characterItem.selects[key]).join('/');}else{correctAnswer=characterItem.selects[answerKey];}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:iconClass,children:isCorrect?'O':'X'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"correctOrIncorrect",children:isCorrect?'正解！':'残念！'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"answerExplanation",children:["\u89E3\u7B54\u30FB\u89E3\u8AAC\uFF1A",correctAnswer]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"explantionText",children:explanation})]});};export default PopupText;
